long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your attention is a precious resource in the digital age. This extension acts as a pacer for your attention to keep you focused throughout the entire reading. Control the speed and style. Devour text content.

Students reading digital resources, teachers, reporters, journalists, politicians, any random reader browsing blogs on the web can benefit from this simple tool.
